       Megatron shook his head. "Actually, I think talking to him over 
communications would be better. Were a little steamed right now and I wouldnt 
want you or Rampage to acidentally kill one of the Rebels." And then 
proceeded over to the communications array.
       "Contact Killfest and talk about our main focus...The Maximals and 
Allience. We are not taking about alligning or a peace treaty. I am not going 
to help them, and I know they wont help us. Discuss with him the main agenda, 
and that by fuding with ourselfs wont get us anywhere." And then continued, 
"If I talk to him it would just anger him, and besides, Im far to furious at 
him at the moment. Got that? Yes."
       Turning on his heel he came over to Quickstrike, "And how are you 
feeling?"

       Hell Beast and Gremlin rested for a moment on the banks of a large 
lake. It was surrounded by trees on all sides, and across from them they 
could see a small human village and a few fishing ships in the lake. He 
assumed this was thier main hunting and gathering grounds. A long time ago he 
would have captured them and pumped them full of liquid energon, made them 
into soldiers to crush his foes. But that was a long time ago....
       "So, are we leaving or not?" Gremlin said, still confused on the 
situation.
       Hel lBeast didnt think the split between the Predacons was wise, after 
all, now they were just going to war agianst each other. Meantime, the 
Maximals would get back on thier feet and the Allience would continue its 
expanse. The diplomat needed a group he could trust.
       "Personally, I dont know. Megatron is a marked bot, Killfest's team is 
a group of Rebels who wont attack the Maximals or Allience. For now, Gremlin, 
it looks like were stuck on this rock. " He shighed. If Megatron would allign 
with another group....then mabey he could make up his mind. In the mean time, 
he just wanted to sit in the calmness of the surrounding beauty.


--part1_bb.996b764.276164be_boundary
